item.title: Vulnerability Intelligence Working Group
item.description: Call Details: Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://zoom.us/j/291298605 Or iPhone one-tap : US: +16699006833,291298605# or +16468769923,,291298605# Or Telephone: Dial(for higher quality, dial a number based on your current location): US: +1 669 900 6833 or +1 646 876 9923 Singapore: +65 3158 7288 United Kingdom: +44 (0) 20 3695 0088 or +44 20 3051 2874 Meeting ID: 291 298 605 International numbers available: https://zoom.us/u/ekps90NHw And it is 4:00 pm WHY Sources of vulnerability intelligence, such as the National Vulnerability Database, are used throughout the industry and are an essential datasource for many commercial and open-source projects.
